Articles.Content:
Howdy everyone,

I've been playing more KSP recently in my free time. I figure that I have the hardware and internet speeds to support it now, so if y'all wanted, you can pop over to Twitch and check out as I livestream KSP, keep me company in the chat! I don't have an exact time frame beyond starting here in a few minutes from the creation of this post, but a goal I set for myself just a few seconds ago was not to end until I've successfully landed on the Mun and Minmus.

Happy 50th, Apollo 11, and my twitch is riiiiiight here. See you soon!

life happen series ; ) all the best tex in the twitch "ultimate" arena , )

Edited July 21, 2019 by WinkAllKerb''
"ultimate" & welcome back
